Articles.Content:
In MechJeb 1.9 there was a very handy phase angle toggle which showed all the current phase angels to the other planetary bodies.

I'm missing this option in MechJeb 2, apparently there is only a phase angle to target, however that doesn't seem to work when selecting a planet or moon. Am I missing something perfectly obvious?!

I think you mean "phase ANGLES".

You can now add and edit custom info windows to show such information.

These items are listed under orbit section, named as All moon angles and All planet angles.
Well that was embarrassing Yes of course angles haha, and thanks dude, exactly what I was looking for!
